page.title: 16Armed Forces in Strensall
page.content: {Depot, The King's Division}is an {infantry basic training unit}serving six English and two Irish Regular Battalions, plus six Territorial Battalions. Adult recruits join the Depot from civilian life to undergo 20 weeks of basic training. Territorial Army recruits complete 2 weeks. The Depot also organises courses for weapon training, drummers and TA Potential Officers. The{permanent {staff}of the Depot are mostly selected from the Regiments of the Division. These men are all qualified instructors in all aspects of infantry training and would have been trained in the Depot themselves at some time. The King's Division itself was formed in{1968}when the Yorkshire,Lancastrian and North Irish Brigades amalgamated.
